name: Writing by Bobby Jack
abstract: This is a collection of links to various writing I have produced
words: for this site, alongside a series of shorter
which are more concise and cover games i’ve played briefly, for free.
in february 2020, i began writing reviews and contributing features for
, an online and print publication. as of july 2022,
the highlight was undoubtedly my review for
five-page spread in the october 2020 issue
. i also wrote a feature retrospective of

my role has since developed with promotions to reviews editor and, in 2021, editor-in-chief. as editor, i take overall responsibility for the magazine, develop new features, proof & edit each issue, and manage the team. i continue to write content and manage the review process in this role.
in october 2020, i started a position as
. the role demands pitching ideas for articles relating to technology in the wider sense; i currently specialise in topics covering programming, gaming, and the explanation of technical concepts.

in july 2021 i took on a role as a floating editor which involves proofing and editing articles on a daily basis. in march 2022, i started working as an editor for the programming section of the site.
